entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.5.4
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • Guess log level will also check severity  -  by @EliasAx in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3294 (f01ce)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.5.5
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • Supports empty values for logfmt  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3300 (36e5a)
  • deps: Update dependency unplugin-vue-macros to ^2.12.3  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3296 (96366)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.6.0
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Adds support for filtering levels  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3306 (1e526)
  • Supports auth ttl to override session duration with DOZZLE_AUTH_TTL env  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3313 (56733)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes broken download logs for agent. fixes #3308  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3311 and https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3308 (157b2)
  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3303 (00f0c)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3310 (dc18e)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3315 (39b3b)

   üèé Performance

  • Fixes performance issue with sql table  -  by @amir20 (9bbe3)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.6.1
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Adds a toggle for all levels  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3321 (5e330)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes empty blank links to not show up as json  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3324 (2c2e3)
  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3318 (6722a)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3322 (853a5)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3327 (dc9f4)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.6.2
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Removes rounded corners in compact mode  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3332 (8b1ad)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes an edge case where a container might get stuck in created state  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3338 (f3ab5)
  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3330 (ce096)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3336 (4026e)
    View changes on GitHub
